instruction: How can you keep your hands warm in cold weather?
output: In cold weather, you can keep your hands warm by wearing gloves or mittens, wear a hat or a hood to keep your head warm, wear layers of clothing to provide insulation, and limit your exposure to the cold by avoiding windy areas and staying indoors when possible. You can also try to keep your hands warm by exercising, drinking warm drinks, or running your hands under warm water for a few minutes.
